details.Broker Comment: Checked on the status of the loan payoff back in May 2015 with Quicken loan.  I was told these can take a few months to process.  I was informed that I would receive confirmation by mail when processed.  On December 11/2015 I was informed by Quicken that that loan had been paid off and fulfilled as of 6/18/15.  They sent confirmation to my previous address which I had not been at for over a year.  Mail was no longer being forwarded and I did not receive written confirmation. I became aware on 12/11/15, that the Compromised was accepted.
